name: Noir (jakob_reborn)
description:
Made in 3 days unfortunately, so it's a little buggy.

Our hero is a very famous detective in the city. One day a rich guy comes to him, suspecting that someone is trying to murder his wife. Our hero goes on his way to solve this puzzle. What will happen to him? Check on your own.

Team
Programming, game design, level design, animation : Jakub Stankiewicz

3D modeling, story, scenario : Jenia Vladimirova
